# Paillier Encryption Backend

## Examples

### Key generation

-   Input
    `cargo run -- keygen`
-   Output

    `encryptionKey: {"n":""}
    decryptionKey: {"p":"","q":""}`

### Encryption

-   Input
    `cargo run -- encrypt --message 42 --ek "{\"n\":\"\"}"`

-   Output
    `{"ciphertext":"{\"raw\":\"\",\"components\":1,\"_phantom\":null}"}`

### Decryption

-   Input
    `cargo run -- decrypt --ciphertext "{\"raw\":\"\",\"components\":1,\"_phantom\":null}" --dk "{\"p\":\"\",\"q\":\"\"}"`
-   Output
    `{"plaintext":42}`
